subject: Heart
description: Heart diseases are one of the most common and dangerous illnesses, affecting millions worldwide.

details.description: 40% of people in India died due to health-related issues.
Increased awareness led to a decrease in smoking-related deaths.
Introduction of new health policies reduced obesity rates.

subject: Cancer
description: Cancer encompasses a large group of diseases characterized by the uncontrolled growth of abnormal cells.

subject: Kidney
description: Kidney diseases affect the ability of the kidneys to function properly, leading to various health issues.

details.description: Kidney-related health issues rose due to poor diets.
More donations helped increase successful transplants.

subject: Cells
description: Cell biology studies the structure, function, and behavior of cells, the basic units of life.

details.description: Stem cell therapy became more accessible.

subject: Kidney Tumors
description: Kidney tumors are abnormal growths in the kidneys, which can be benign or cancerous.

details.description: Incidence of kidney tumors increased due to improved detection methods.
Advances in treatments led to better outcomes for patients.
Research focused on early detection and new therapeutic approaches.

subject: Lungs
description: Lung diseases range from chronic conditions like COPD to acute infections such as pneumonia.

details.description: Lung disease rates rose due to pollution.
Air quality improvements reduced lung diseases.
